info.title: Product Material-Based Composition
info.description:
This service writes data that is provided by an external application to the material-based composition of a product in the Product Compliance solution in SAP S/4HANA Cloud. It uses the provided data to create or update a version of the material-based composition of a product. In addition, the service can also read data of the material-based composition and provides this data to an external application.

You can apply any of the filters provided or retrieve all existing data.

x-sap-shortText: Create and update material-based compositions for products and read material-based composition data using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Chemical Compliance Approval for Purchased Material and Supplier(31G)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/31G " Link To BP ")
[Assess Marketability of a Product(31H)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/31H " Link To BP ")
[Assess Dangerous Goods for a Product(3FC)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/3FC " Link To BP ")
[Manage Safety Data Sheets for Products(3VR)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/3VR " Link To BP ")
[Request Regulatory Documentation from Service Provider(6AV)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/6AV " Link To BP ")
